mapper.select: SELECT order_info.order_code,order_info.cont_code,order_info.item_code,item.item_name,item_mrp,item_require,item_prodate,item_due FROM item,order_info where order_info.order_code= (SELECT order_code FROM order_info WHERE order_code=#{order_code}) AND order_info.item_code=item.item_code

SELECT od.order_code, od.cont_code, od.item_code, it.item_name, item_mrp, item_require, item_prodate, item_due FROM item it,order_info od WHERE od.item_code=it.item_code AND order_code LIKE '%'||#{order_code}||'%'

UPDATE order_info SET order_code = #{order_code}, cont_code = #{cont_code}, item_code = #{item_code}, item_mrp = #{item_mrp}, item_require = ${item_require}, item_prodate = #{item_prodate}, item_due = #{item_due} WHERE order_code = #{order_code}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM order_info WHERE order_code = #{order_code}
SELECT DISTINCT order_code FROM order_info WHERE ROWNUM < = 4 AND order_code LIKE UPPER(#{order_code})||'%'
SELECT DISTINCT cont_code FROM order_info WHERE ROWNUM < = 4 AND cont_code LIKE UPPER(#{cont_code})||'%'
SELECT DISTINCT item_code FROM order_info WHERE ROWNUM < = 4 AND item_code LIKE UPPER(#{item_code})||'%'
